name.ja: <ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>極<rt>きょく</rt></ruby><ruby>輝<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>－<ruby>熊斗竜巧<rt>ベアトロン</rt></ruby><ruby>α<rt>アルファ</rt></ruby>

text.en:
(This card is always treated as an "Ursarctic" and "Drytron" card.)
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by card effect. If you control an "Ursarctic" or "Drytron" monster other than "Ultimate Knight Alpha Ursatron": You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can add 1 "Ursarctic" or "Drytron" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Ultimate Knight Alpha Ursatron" once per turn.
